short_summary: CCGS Sir William Alexander refit alongsideref?
description: supply adherence to specifications with limited inspection
full_summary:
### Request for Proposal for Refit of CCGS Sir William Alexander
## Overview
The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) on behalf of the Department of Fisheries and Oceans (DFO) invites bidders to submit proposals for the alongside refit of the vessel CCGS Sir William Alexander.

## Procurement Details
*   **Solicitation Number**: WS3954644600
*   **Publication Date**: April 12, 2023
*   **Tender Closing Date**: May 11, 2023 at 14:00:00
*   **Expected Contract Start Date**: May 16, 2016 (previously)
*   **Procurement Category**: Goods and Services

## Contract Requirements
-   The contractor must carry out an alongside refit of the CCGS Sir William Alexander at Halifax Harbour, commencing on June 1, 2023, and ending on July 27, 2023.
-   The contractor must also perform any approved unscheduled work not covered in the requirement documentation.
-   The contractor is responsible for adhering to the requirements outlined in the supply arrangement E6HAL-160002 SA Ship Repairs Halifax Harbour.

## Bid Submission and Evaluation Criteria
-   All bids must be submitted electronically through CanadaBuys (SAP Ariba) only. Bids submitted through any other means will not be considered.
-   The proposal will be accepted based on the lowest price criteria.

## Contact Information
-   **Contact Person**: Dave Dunne (SPAC/PSPC)
-   **Contact Email**: dave.dunne@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
-   **Trade Agreements**: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

## Amendment Disclaimer
The solicitation number and date has been amended five times prior to the final publication date. 

## Shipping Address

200 Kent Street,
Ottawa, Ontario,
Canada,
K1A 0E6
